modName: Boss Fight The First Dragon Slayer
summary: A deadly enemy capable of wiping out legions of foes. This is an epic boss that only those skilled in blocking, bashing, and have sufficient gear may defeat.
descriptionHtml:
BOSS FIGHT! (FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO LOVED THE OMEGA DEATH BOSS MOD!)
Quick Demo Video Included! YouTube Link >>>>> https://youtu.be/rJ6f67qoOKk

I walked up the ancient stone steps of this frozen wasteland. I stood atop my destination with my sword in hand. I heard a dragon roar from the blistering winds beyond. From the howling blizzard a dragon fell into view. It's body bloody and beaten. Its eyes glassed over as its life faded away. My opponent was dead, but not by my hand. As the torrents of icy winds parted, a figure came into view, and I prepared myself. "You'll meet your end mortal," Shouted a dreadful voice from beyond. I rushed to engage my opponent, but I was easily blocked. A massive decaying man adorned in ancient nordic armor stood before me. His breath colder than death. His strength greater than anything I had ever encountered. My body began to trickle with pain as a surge of lightning coursed through my body. I felt my body begin to slip into Sovngarde. The man struck at me and his colossal blow sent me flying. I looked up with determination in my eye. The battle for the ages was about to begin. The Mighty Dragonborn vs the First Dragon Slayer.

This mod adds the powerful level 60 boss, known as the First Dragon Slayer, to the map. To find him, you must visit Riverrun's Inn the Sleeping Giant. From there you must enter and find a written report on Delphine's desk for clues to this foe's whereabouts.

FEATURES OF THE BOSS.

*Unique resistances to be lore friendly and challenging. (Followers do less damage, dragon breath element type resistances, chance for massive heal for round 2, Unrelenting Force and Vampire Grip will not affect him!)

*His sword is lootable if you can survive! Its a two hand greatsword with the ability to knock back non blocking opponents and etherealize them while dealing painful elemental damage over time. It also causes 30 seconds to fear to NPCs and banishes summons!

*Upon initiating the fight, the skies will begin to storm with lightning atop the mountain top battleground! Be warned!

*He is larger than most foes and has slightly more range and sprint speed for covering ground.

HE COMES IN 3 VARIETIES!!!!!!

Standard: 3,000 points of extra health to make the battle last and be memorable. This is the ideal battle.
Brutal: 10,000 points of extra health! This is intended for people who use extremely over powered mods or multiple followers. For a real challenge!
Ultimate Death Edition: 25,000 points of extra health and faster attack speeds! He sprints even faster now! FOR THE SUICIDAL AND GLORY SEEKERS!

DOWNLOAD NOTES: It is easier to download the file manually and drag the file to the C:\Users\Program files x86 > Steam > Steam Apps >
Common > Skyrim > Data >
author: Commandercoldz

files.name: The First Dragon Slayer Ultimate Death Edition
